listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Look out over azure seas and lush green hilltops from the perfectly named Villa Belle. Set on a hillside overlooking Choeng Mon, this Koh Samui vacation rental has gorgeous views—and equally appealing living spaces from which to enjoy them. Reserve its three bedrooms for a luxury getaway with family, a tropical escape with friends or even a dreamy honeymoon in the sun.

Your holiday at Villa Belle begins with an airport transfer and includes a daily continental breakfast, shuttle service to and from the beach, and full-time Thai chef service. Spend lazy days watching the sun on the sea from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, loungers, al-fresco dining and a barbecue, or find your flow in the yoga area. After dark, flip on the Apple TV or satellite TV, sample the villa’s wine selection or catch up via Wi-Fi.

Inside the villa, high ceilings and an open-concept layout are paired with traditional-inspired furnishings and artwork for a clean, contemporary look. Nearly wall-to-wall sliding glass doors link the living and dining areas to the terrace for uninterrupted sea views. Those same vistas are reflected in the mirrored breakfast bar in the well-equipped kitchen.

Each of the three bedrooms at this luxury property has a king bed, private en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, sound system and an outdoor space, whether a deck or lounge area. As in the main living areas, the bedrooms are a stylish mix of the traditional and the modern.

Though it’s set on a rise above the water, Villa Belle is just a half mile from the picture-perfect sands of Choeng Mon Beach, meaning that you’re just minutes away from a nap on its soft white sands, a massage or snack from a local vendor or a swim in the clear waters. It’s also a short drive from the nearest golf course and the lively outdoor market of Fisherman’s Village.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This spectacular luxury villa on the southwestern shore of Phuket Island is just minutes from Kamala Beach. Its exquisite indoor and outdoor living areas are perfectly situated for enjoying the panoramic ocean views and breezes ("Samira" means "cool breeze"). For families, destination wedding guests, and adventurous friends seeking a unique and breathtaking setting for their Thailand adventure, this six-bedroom vacation rental will be unforgettable.

The villa's extraordinary design—a contemporary variation on classic Thai themes—includes a spectacular pool terrace and equally impressive alfresco Great Room overlooking the Andaman Sea and the Bay of Bengal. Enjoy fresh mornings bathing in the hot tub and floating in the nineteen-meter infinite swimming pool. Relax on poolside loungers, withdraw beneath the parasol for cocktails, and relish a barbeque lunch at the lovely alfresco table. In the evening, gather in the open Great Room, with sumptuous furnishings and soaring ceilings, to savor the beautiful sunset.

Sliding glass walls invite delicious ocean breezes and dreamy views into the villa's gorgeous living and dining areas. Enjoy evening aperitifs in the elegant lounge. Prepare your favorite Thai dishes in the fully equipped kitchen, and congregate at the lovely dining table for ocean-view feasts. At night, retire to the media room to watch movies on the projector screen, or play a game of pool in the game room. Upon waking in the morning, refresh your body in the spa. Private chef, spa, and other services are available at extra cost.

The villa's superb master bedroom suite features a king bed, an ample and furnished balcony with ocean views and a jetted plunge pool, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. The five guest bedrooms all feature king beds, too, along with balconies, ocean views, and ensuite bathrooms (two with ocean-view tubs). The king bed in bedroom six can be converted into two twins.

Villa Samira enjoys an ideal balance of serene seclusion and convenient proximity to the island's cultural and natural riches. Kamala Beach is just six kilometers away, while Patong Beach and Surin Beach can be reached in minutes. Golf lovers are an easy drive to Red Mountain Golf Course and Laguna Golf Course. The bustling town of Patong is a fifteen-minute drive from your garage.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This enchanting villa is situated within a private, gated community along the west coast of the island of Phuket, within walking distance of Surin Beach. It was designed by Ernesto Bedmar and features beautiful natural materials that harmonize with the lush coastline and timeless sea, while high-end appliances and amenities provide an exquisite luxury experience. Professional staff and services include a private chef, housekeeping, and a villa manager.

The villa offers ample opportunity to savor its extraordinary vistas of Surin Bay while savoring the South Pacific sun and breeze. The tiered deck features two pools: a kid-friendly pool with jets and a main pool with infinite edge that fuses with the turquoise expanse. A sala pavilion features sumptuous daybeds, while a shaded table invites you to alfresco meals in the enchanting breeze. At sunset, gather for cocktails on the rooftop terrace and behold the sunset over the Andaman Sea.

Sliding glass doors open to the main pavilion, infusing the living areas with ocean light and alfresco ambiance. Sectional sofas in the lounge are ideal for nighttime gatherings, while the dining table seats eight for home-cooked feasts. The villa includes a separate entertainment room as well as a private fitness room, and its Western and Asian-style kitchens are fully equipped with chef-grade appliances.

The villa features a master suite with a king bed, two guest suites with one double bed each, and a kid-friendly suite with a double bed and bunk bed. Each suite is well appointed with an ensuite bathroom, desk, lounge, safe, and ceiling fan, and all enjoy balconies and ocean views. The vaulted master suite is on the upper level and enjoys particularly sublime vistas from its furnished balcony, while its bathroom includes a soaking tub beside a picture window.

The villa offers a fine balance of exquisite privacy and convenient proximity to the cultural, natural, and sporting riches of Phuket. You can walk to Surin Beach or drive a few minutes of Kamala Beach, while golf-lovers can take their pick of Phuket Golf Center, Laguna Golf Resort, and Loch Palm. Families will love the FantaSea theme park, less than three kilometers away. Proximity to Phuket International Airport makes this villa an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Baan Dalah is a stunning beachfront luxury villa on the island of Koh Samui. Situated near Bophut on the northeast coast, the villa's estate borders a sublime stretch of Big Buddha Beach and enjoys panoramic ocean views of the Gulf of Thailand and the island of Koh Phan Ngan. Beautiful outdoor living areas, exquisite interior spaces, and three sumptuous bedrooms create a unique private world for an unforgettable vacation with family and friends.

The private estate includes three pavilions surrounding a beautiful Buddhist garden, along with a gorgeous terrace with nineteen-meter infinite swimming pool bordering the beach's pristine white sand. Savor enchanting hours on elegant loungers in the South Pacific sun, and float in the scintillating pool while gazing out on breathtaking, unobstructed vistas. Plunge into the azure sea and return for a delicious alfresco lunch on the terrace. Linger outdoors through the evening, sipping sunset cocktails and relishing the nocturnal breeze.

Lovely glass doors join the terrace and the main pavilion, inviting an exquisite open-air feel indoors. Relax with a bottle of wine and your favorite TV shows in the beautiful lounge. Cook fabulous Thai meals in the fully equipped kitchen, and feast together at the superb dining table. The main living room features high, peaked ceilings of rich wood, evoking classic Thai tradition, while the elegant furnishings provide modern comfort in harmony with the precious natural surroundings. Your vacation rental additionally includes excellent staff and provisions, including daily breakfast.

The master bedroom is in its own pavilion. Spacious and exquisitely furnished, it features a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom. The two guestrooms occupy the third pavilion; one has a king bed and one has two twins, and they both have ensuite bathrooms. All of the villa's bedrooms include safes, ceiling fans, and doors to the main terrace.

In addition to your direct access to Big Buddha Beach, you're just minutes by car from some of the island's finest and most renowned beaches, including Bophut and Chaweng. Fisherman's Village is only three kilometers away, and Wat Plai Laem about three. The airport is only four kilometers away, and complimentary two-way transfer is provided. Baan Dalah is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched on a hillside amongst lush tropical greenery, this extremely well-appointed luxury rental earns the name Grand Villa with ease. All six of its beautiful bedrooms feature king-sized beds, walk-in closets, private balconies, en-suite bathrooms. Accommodations for twelve, a spacious atmosphere, and its central location make Grand Villa the perfect host for a family vacation, golf trip, retreat, or special event. And, it’s just a few minutes from the beach.

Modern Thai architecture is quickly becoming the new standard for tropical luxury homes. The complexity of Grand Villa’s design is subtly downplayed by its greyscale color scheme and clean straight lines, creating a space that is chic, stylish, elegant, and tranquil, all at the same time. The exterior features many openings to the terrace and balconies, ensuring fresh ocean breeze flows freely throughout the interior. The decor is bright and cheerful. Designer furniture, eclectic art, and high-tech electronics fill the indoor spaces. And, the open-concept layout combines the kitchen, living room, lounge, and terrace into one huge social space, great for entertaining.

Grand Villa is equipped with Wi-Fi, safes, a sound system, air conditioning, and a washer/dryer. In the kitchen, there’s high-end stainless steel appliances, a coffee machine, dishwasher, and wine fridge.The formal dining area inside has seating for twelve. There’s also furnished dining and living spaces on the terrace. While you’re outside, enjoy views of the beautiful Andaman Sea from the infinity pool, a sun lounger, or rooftop patio.

Three kilometers towards the coast, you’ll find Surin Beach. Surrounded by luxury hotels, million dollar vacation homes, and high-end restaurants and wine bars, Surin Beach is a popular spot for wealthy travelers. Golf is popular on Phuket as well, with several scenic courses in Grand Villa’s vicinity. Phuket Golf Centre and Laguna are the two closest course. Both feature challenging hole layouts lined with lush greenery and natural lagoons.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Let the warm sea and five-star service wash—and pamper—your cares away at Villa Neung. Part of the exclusive gated Mandalay Beach Villas on the gorgeous coast of Koh Samui, this three-bedroom vacation rental offers true luxury in its melding of a beautiful beachfront setting, attentive staff and thoughtful modern design.

Your stay at Villa Neung begins with a complimentary airport transfer, and includes continental breakfast and the services of a chef, housekeeper and property manager. Spend your holiday enjoying the sea breeze from a lounge chair by the infinity pool, or step down to the beach to sunbathe or paddle along the shore in one of the villa’s kayaks. In the evenings, try out local seafood on the barbecue and make the most of the balmy weather with dinner at the al-fresco table.

The villa’s layout separates the property into two halves: one with the open-air great room, the other with the more private bedrooms. In the great room, you can opt to let the warm air waft in over the relaxed yet refined wicker sectional and chic Louis Ghost-style dining chairs, or let the blinds down for shade. At the far end of the room, the fully equipped kitchen features an inviting breakfast bar and sleek, state-of-the-art appliances.

Each of the three bedrooms at Villa Neung has a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and opens to the terrace. Details like built-in cupboards and shelves, low-slung beds with crisp white bedding and wicker accent chairs give the bedrooms serene, comfortable appeal.

Whether you’ve come to Koh Samui for a family beach vacation or a tropical honeymoon, you’ll find something near Villa Neung to please. The property is located right on the sands of Ban Laem Noi, and there are five other beaches to explore within an 18 km drive, from Nathon with its pier and night market to trendy Bophut. Play a round of golf at Santiburi Samui Country Club, visit the charming oceanfront Fisherman’s Village Plaza, stand in awe at Big Buddha Temple or meet local fauna at Na Muang Safari Park. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 23 km drive from the villa to Samui Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Dahlia is a stunning contemporary waterfront villa on the island of Koh Samui. Situated near Choeng Mon on the island's northeastern shore, the villa is just fifty paces from the nearest beach and enjoys breathtaking, panoramic views of Thongson Bay and the Gulf of Thailand. The villa features extraordinary open-air living and dining areas along with exquisite interiors and top-end amenities. Three superb and ample bedrooms accommodate six guests, perfect for families, multiple couples, or small groups of friends.

With a gorgeous infinite swimming pool, ample lounge areas, and the scintillating waves lapping the shore beneath you, the villa's balcony is ideal for savoring the South Pacific sun and breeze. A wall of sliding glass doors joins the balcony and interior living areas, creating a seamless space for relaxation and entertainment. Enjoy dreamy days luxuriating on elegant loungers, floating in the pool's sparkling waters, and sipping cool refreshments in the shaded lounge. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, cook a delicious meal in the fully equipped kitchen, and relish it around the lovely dining table. Sip sunset cocktails in the main lounge while gazing at the horizon, and watch your favorite shows on TV when night falls. Stunning original decorative objects, at once modern and traditional, evoke the timeless beauty of coastal Thailand with consummate style.

Each of the bedroom suites echoes the main living area in layout and décor, with a glass wall opening from the room to a furnished terrace. There are two rooms with one king bed each and one room with a queen bed. Each suite includes an ensuite bathroom and is equipped with air conditioning, a safe, and a television. Each enjoys breathtaking ocean views.

Villa Dahlia offers a perfect balance of seclusion and proximity to the many pleasures of Koh Samui. Walk literally steps to the beautiful beach beside you, or drive to any number of world-class beaches, including nearby Naturism Beach. There are some excellent restaurants near by and you're a short drive to the fabulous Six Senses Resort, with its extraordinary restaurant on the tip of the peninsula, Dining on the Rocks. Samui Airport is just about five kilometers away, making the villa an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Samayra is an oceanfront villa located on the idyllic Thai-island paradise of Koh Samui. Located beside the prestigious Viewpoint Landmark, this resplendent abode is just a three minute walk from the fantastic beaches and exciting nightlife of Chaweng. The ultra-modern design and seaside location of Villa Samayra makes it a perfect destination for weddings, birthdays, anniversaries and other special celebrations. Welcome to Koh Samui!

Villa Samayra offers 180-degree vistas of the coastline, coconut lined beachfronts and ocean. The grounds include an infinity lap pool, koi pond and a huge sun terrace. At night, the villa flourishes with an entertainment deck illuminated by an LED lighting system that offers a selection of five different color-settings so the mood is always just right. A limestone staircase bends along the terrace of the master bedroom and onto the final seaside level. Another wooden deck below guides you past a gym, steam room and an outdoor rain shower. From here, a stone footpath meanders down to the rocky coast where fishing and nature spotting are two popular activities.

Villa Samayra’s interiors provide an additional wow factor. The lounge, dining area and kitchen pavilion feature two luxurious Jim Thompson sofas alongside a handcrafted wooden lounge table facing a 52-inch Sony LCD Television with surround sound and satellite television connection. A large, handcrafted dining table seats twelve and features a centerpiece of chic, candlelit ornaments. Guests can enjoy observing their meals being prepared by the private chef included with your reservation. You may even try your own hand at Thai cooking!

All of the bedrooms feature ensuite bathrooms, air conditioning, televisions, DVD players, terrace access and picturesque sea views. The master suite includes a chic, white, four post bed that almost appears to be floating on turquoise waters.

Villa Samayra is situated in a convenient location directly between the picturesque beaches and exciting night life of Chaweng and Lamai, making this villa an excellent choice for those who wish to be away from the hustle and bustle of town centers, but also within easy distance of all the island fun and activities. You will also be just minutes away from the Royal Samui Golf & Country Club. Go ahead, take a swing!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Creating an oasis of calm and privacy are gardens landscaped by the renowned designer Bill Bensley, creative touches enhance the individuality and bespoke customisation that defines this retreats.

Kalya's two-storey layout of spacious pavilions, high vaulted ceilings and sliding glass doors connecting the indoor and outdoor spaces, is in complete harmony with the natural surroundings.

Stylish, comfortable interiors are filled with hand-woven fabrics, traditionally carved furniture, and one-off specially commissioned pieces. Their expansive outside area comes complete with a private 20m infinity pool, swim-up bar, open-air dining, and relaxing day beds. All feature state-of-the-art amenities, modern kitchens, and a full team of dedicated staff to ensure the best in personal service.

With your own private chef on hand day and night, you can enjoy custom-designed menus meticulously prepared with fresh local produce and the halthiest of ingredients. Fine wines compliment the authentic Royal Thai cuisine and Western gastronomy. Magnificent views from the outdoor dining space or the open plan glass-walled living space complete this unparalleled dining experience.

listing.listing_description:
From its prestigious perch on the hills of Bo Phut, this luxurious six bedroom home enjoys panoramic views of the lush Koh Samui valley and distant sea. With spacious interiors, a functional balcony lounge, and a large swimming pool, Noloom Hills is the perfect setting for a private family getaway, couples retreat, or high-end corporate event. Ten minutes from home, you’ll find the sandy shores of Bo Phut Beach, Royal Samui Golf Club, and the quaint shops and restaurants of Fisherman’s Village.

Light and airy, this modern villa uses view-framing glass and wide openings to the terrace to invite fresh sea breeze and natural sunlight to flow freely within. The many indoor/outdoor sitting areas provide more than enough space for group gatherings, as well as places to sneak away for more intimate moments. The villa’s fully equipped kitchen is decked out in state of the art appliances, making it easy to unforgettable dinner parties. Each bedroom comes with a lavish ensuite bathroom. And, all but one have direct access to an outdoor space.

Noloom Hills is outfitted with Smart television and Wi-Fi, should you decide to stay connected. The incredibly scenic terrace features great spots for working on your tan, as well as shady areas to enjoy your morning coffee while you look over the valley below. During your stay, you’ll have full-time security, a villa manager, airport transfer, and chef service for lunches.

Thailand is well known for its pristine beaches, beautiful golf courses, historical sites, and vibrant nightlife. Within about thirty-kilometers, you’ll be able to visit Koh Samui’s most prized attractions, including Big Buddha Temple, Nathon Pier, and the World famous Nikki Beach. For a night on the town, the Nathon Night Food Market is an exciting place to try out different Thai cuisine, and dance the night away in Nathon’s bars and nightclubs.

listing.listing_description:
Your ultimate tropical hideaway.

Located on the west coast of Thailand, a short distance from Phuket, is the resort island of Koh Yao Noi that hosts the newly completed 4-Bedroom Eagle’s Nest Luxury Villa overlooking the stunning Phang Nga Bay. The seascape of unique limestone islands is incomparable and considered by many to be one of the best views in Asia - in fact for that reason the nearby islands were used as a setting in the 1974 James Bond film, The Man with the Golden Gun.

Only 20 minutes from Phuket by speedboat but a million miles from the stresses of modern life, the island paradise of Koh Yao Noi may just be Thailand’s best kept secret. It is located within the magnificent Marine National Park of Phang Nga Bay which possesses over 40 islands and is home to indigenous sea gypsies and protected wildlife. This tropical island is accessible only by boat or helicopter and thus remains largely undeveloped, natural and peaceful. To arrive here is to step back in time.

Completed in 2018, on an island with few private villas, the Eagle’s Nest luxury villa is unique for its quality and outlook. The sweeping panoramas from the property are simply breathtaking and can be seen from every room in this expansive estate nestled among the tree-tops. A skilled and personal staffing team ensures that every whim is catered for. The rental offering includes an open-air seated van and driver. This is more than a home away from home, this is a serviced luxury villa on a remote and idyllic tropical island with every detail thought out.

listing.listing_description:
Located in the ultra-desirable Surin Beach enclave on the West Coast of Phuket, Villa Chan Grajang enjoys exquisite views over Surin Beach and Bang Tao. The house stands high above the bay facing northwest with sunsets out over the Indian Ocean you’ll look forward to night after night. Villa Chan Grajang is comprised of two villas, over a total of over 2,272 square meters.

In the grounds of the villa, the Balinese outdoor wooden table seats 12 and is ideal for BBQs or breakfast, while the dining room with its solid teak table and views out over Surin Beach offers a cooler internal option. The games room sports a 3/4 size snooker table, dart board, bar area, as well as television and DVD player. The main villa boasts a stunning infinity pool ideal for recreation or laps. There is a Sala for those in-house massages, as well as a fully functional exercise room with cable television and equipped with exercise machines.

The first villa has four double bedrooms and the second has two double bedrooms. All bedrooms are en-suite. The villa can sleep up to 12 comfortably, with parking for six cars and offers choices from a six bedroom hire all the way down to a single couple. Four of the six bedrooms have their own furnished deck areas.

Unique to the house is a 30 metre all-weather chipping and putting area on the lower lawn, providing hours of entertainment for kids as well as an extensive grassy areas for them to play in.

listing.listing_description:
Naam Sawan is a stunning luxury villa on the northern shore of Phuket, Thailand. Situated in the Cape Yamu Estate—developed by Philippe Starck and Jean-Michel Gathy—the villa is within walking distance of the estate's exclusive beach, and enjoys an ideal balance of seaside seclusion and convenient proximity to numerous attractions and golf clubs. Extraordinary alfresco living areas, exquisite interiors, and four deluxe bedrooms suites create an outstanding vacation rental for families, friends, and destination wedding guests.

Surrounded by lush tropical forest, the villa's ample terrace and lawn invite you to dreamy days in the South Pacific sun. Luxuriate on elegant loungers, plunge into the sparkling swimming pool, and sip cool refreshments at the swim-up bar. Returning from the beach, gather in the dining pavilion for a delicious barbeque lunch. In the evening, relish the breathtaking views from the sumptuous lounge on the upper terrace.

An open wall joins the upper terrace with the spectacular great room, inviting sublime ocean views into the home. With high, vaulted ceilings of pickled wood, beautiful Buddhist artwork, and superb furnishings, the great room sets the stage for enchanting evenings together. Sip cocktails in the ample lounge while gazing through two-story windows at expansive vistas. Enjoy feasts at the beautiful dining table for ten, and gather in the home theater at night. The gourmet kitchen, located on the ground floor, is fully equipped and easily serves the pool terrace and great room. The lovely table beside it is perfect for breakfast overlooking the pool and sea.

Each of the four bedroom suites is like a luxury apartment in itself, with king bed, ensuite bathroom, lounge area, desk, television, safe, and direct terrace access. One of the king beds can be separated into two twins, creating an ideal suite for kids.

Naam Sawan enjoys an extaordinary location for relishing the riches of Phucket. Literally steps from Cape Yamu Beach, you're also within easy reach of two piers and three marinas, allowing you to explore the neighboring islands and beaches of Phang Nga Bay. Bango Tao Beach and Surin Beach are easily reachable by car. The extraordinary Bong Pae waterfall within Khao Phra Thaeo National Park is nine kilometers away, while Phuket Town is about twenty.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Carved into the cliff face in the quiet and protected development of Jomchang at the end of Millionaire’s Mile, Villa Wang Nam Jai is one of the most exclusive retreats in Phuket. Spanning five floors, this superior vacation home can be presented as a one-bedroom grand villa or a four-bedroom mansion depending on the size and preferences of your group. Sensational ocean views are a uniting feature of every room and there are plenty of common areas and inspiring terraces where you can meet with friends, dine al fresco or just lose yourself in the view.

As you approach the villa’s gates, grand wooden doors welcome you into a lookout point facing a breathtaking vista of Patong and the Andaman Sea. Water features flow gracefully down each side of the staircase and beautiful white flowers fall from the frangipani trees as you are guided along a path into the main living space. On the top floor you can work out or adopt your yoga poses as you admire the bird’s eye view from the fitness center. The media and entertainment room on the lower floor is ideal for families - there’s a pool table, a library full of books and a television with surround sound. You can step outside from here to the barbecue terrace and mirror-like infinity pool which seems to dissolve straight into the ocean. Follow a magically illuminated path down through the trees to the shore where you can swim or snorkel to your heart’s content.

Wang Nam Jai combines visual elements of Asian style architecture with a Western design and full-length sliding glass doors and vaulted wooden ceilings lend the rooms an air of liberty and affluence.

The doors in the main living room can be retracted to allow fresh sea breezes to flow through while you watch the yachts drift across the bay from the comfort of a plush sofa. A spotless ultra-modern kitchen encourages you to whip up a feast for your family and you can choose to dine indoors or outside on the terrace.

All four en-suite bedrooms enjoy magnificent views through sliding glass doors, and access to a private balcony - the ideal morning coffee spot. Take a rain shower or relax in the large tub before slipping under the covers of your king-size bed.

Although you have everything you need for the vacation of a lifetime at your villa, if you want to travel further afield you are surrounded by beaches, golf courses and shopping. Phuket International Airport is 32 km.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This stunning luxury villa on the southeast coast of Koh Samui is perched directly above the water near Chaweng Beach. A unique architectural gem with wonderful amenities and astonishing views, the villa will inspire you to "seize the day" during your group's adventure to this island paradise. Special features include two infinity swimming pools, an open-air hot tub, an ocean-view gym, and a fabulous gourmet kitchen, along with deluxe services provided by a talented staff. Four capacious bedroom suites with king beds and ensuite bathrooms form an ideal abode for families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to eight in size.

Nestled amid 3,000 square meters of lush gardens, the villa's terraces invite you to savor the outdoor delights of Koh Samui. Bask in the sunlight on lounge chairs and dip into the turquoise pools. Sip cocktails at the swim-up bar or in the cool, shaded lounge while gazing at the breathtaking vistas. Gather for alfresco meals in the enchanting breeze, and linger outdoors in the evening, marveling at sunset and stars.

Wide thresholds fuse the upper terrace with the main interior living areas, creating a graceful flow of space and sea-kissed air. The superb modern kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, and easily serves the terrace, dining patio, and interior dining table (with seating for ten). There is also a lovely lounge area and a separate entertainment room with pool table and TV. The hot tub is perched within a quiet niche with beautiful jungle views.

Each bedroom offers a superb haven for couples or individual travelers, with a king bed, private outdoor living area, sea view, air conditioning, TV, and ensuite bathroom. The bathrooms have high-end rain showers with body jets, and three include soaking tubs as well. The stunning master suite additionally features a private lounge.

The villa offers a wonderful balance of lofty seclusion and convenient access to the island's top attractions, including the nearby towns of Chaweng and Lamai. You're about four minutes from Royal Samui Golf Club, and a short drive from several renowned beaches.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched amongst lush tropical greenery, above cliffs that lead down to private beachfront, Villa Beige offers incredible ocean views and access to some of Thailand’s most secluded sandy shoreline. Just follow the private beach path down, and you’ll have barrier-free access to the ocean any time you please. Back up the cliffs, Villa Beige offers its guests four ocean-view en-suite bedrooms, spacious indoor/outdoor area, and a friendly staff to help make all your vacation dreams come true.

Villa Beige’s open concept living room contains the lounge, dining area, and wet bar within its social, ocean-facing environment. Swing open the floor-to-ceiling glass doors and the inside and outside blend seamlessly, allowing fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight to embrace Beige’s large common space. Throughout the villa, you’ll find sleek and stylish furniture, modern decor, and a soothing creamy color palette, perfect for that relaxing beach house atmosphere. Unique spaces like the home theatre, steam sauna, and office ensure that guests will always find somewhere secluded to enjoy some private time, as well as gather as a group.

On the terrace, beach chairs, umbrellas, and tropical greenery surround the infinity pool and lounge spaces. Inside, you’ll have Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a computer, and baby equipment. There’s also a staff consisting of a security guard, butler, spa therapist, and a cook. There are dining areas inside and out, both with seating for eight.

The nearest town to Villa Beige is located just three-minutes inland. You’ll find grocery stores, restaurants, and boutique shops in the small town of Baan Taling Ngam. If you’ve got some extra energy to burn, Villa Beige has a home exercise room, or you could head five-minutes from home to the nearby tennis courts. If there’s a golfer in your group, Royal Samui and Santiburi Country Club feature two of Thailand’s best courses, both are within a half hour’s drive.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A private oasis of calm and tranquility, Atulya Residence features gardens landscaped by the renowned designer Bill Bensley. Creative touches enhance the individuality and bespoke customization that defines this Zen-like retreat. Just minutes from the beach and in the magnificent setting of Bophut Hills, this luxury vacation rental is a superb base from which to explore the beauty of Koh Samui.

The expansive outside area features a 65-foot infinity swimming pool, a swim-up bar, outdoor sound system, open air dining and relaxing day beds. Enjoy your favorite cocktail while taking in the breathtaking view! Indoors, you will find a home entertainment unit and an espresso machine. A dedicated staff ensures the best holiday experience. With a private chef on hand day and night, delight in the custom-designed menus meticulously prepared with fresh local produce. Fine wines compliment the authentic Royal Thai cuisine and Western gastronomy. Some perks included with your reservation are à la carte breakfast, daily baked cookies, smoothies and fresh fruit, housekeeping, butler and 24-hour security.

Atulya Residence’s layout of spacious pavilions, high vaulted ceilings and sliding glass doors that seamlessly connect the indoor and outdoor spaces is in complete harmony with its natural surroundings. Stylish and comfortable interiors are filled with hand-woven fabrics, traditionally carved furniture and one-off specially commissioned pieces. Elegant furnishings and rich wooden accents offer a sublime setting in which to unwind.

Five magnificent bedrooms accommodate up to ten guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the bedrooms offer en-suite bathrooms, dual vanities and televisions. The two master suites offer direct outdoor access. The layout of the villa provides ample space for family and friends to gather, while the pavilions offer privacy for any couples on eternal honeymoon. The picturesque setting and design of Atulya Residence has also made it a favorite for weddings and other events.

For gurus and initiates alike, near your villa, you will find The Yogarden where you can indulge in warm days of yoga and meditation. The Bophut fisherman’s village is also a great place to lounge, eat or shop. Also minutes away is the famed Santiburi Samui golf course, a key stop on the PGA tour. However you spend your days in Koh Samui, soak in the tropical breeze at Atulya Residence and go home refreshed and rejuvenated like never before!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
From its mountaintop perch, villa Suralai enjoys incredible views of Samui’s lush canopy and the ocean. With six luxurious en-suite bedrooms, this contemporary villa is perfect for a family beach vacation, a golf trip with friends, and any other occasion worth celebrating in style. Nearby, you’ll have no trouble finding plenty of pristine beachfront along Chaweng’s coast, as well as golf, shopping, restaurants, and adventure tourism.

Suralai is the home of the angels in Thai mythology, and that is exactly the vibe at this mountaintop getaway. Decorated with rich wood tones, sleek and stylish furniture, and plenty of floor-to-ceiling glass, Suralai shows off its modern contemporary design, while celebrating its beautiful natural surroundings. The spacious living room opens to the terrace and a spectacular ocean view. An open concept layout encourages a social environment, with the main lounge, dining table, and kitchen all residing under the wood-paneled, vaulted ceiling. In the kitchen, state of the art appliances are seamlessly integrated into the functional workspace against the rear wall. Just in front, a seven-seat bar with built-in wine coolers separates the kitchen area, without closing it off.

Outside, Suralai’s covered lounge area is sunken to meet the level of the pool’s built-in bar. Whether you feel like enjoying a cocktail from a bar stool underwater or keeping dry in the lounge, you’ll be able to share the same table with everyone else. Inside, Suralai is outfitted with high-end electronics, air-conditioned bedrooms, a home gym, and Wi-Fi. The villa is staffed with an English speaking manager, maid, handyman, chef that prepares a complimentary daily breakfast.

Nearby, at Chaweng Beach, you’ll find six kilometers of gorgeous, sandy coast. The beach is lined with resorts, shopping, restaurants, and vibrant nightlife establishments. After a day on the beach, head to Ark Bar, at Chaweng Beach’s center, to enjoy a refreshing cocktail under the sun. And, if there’s a golfer in your group, Santiburi Golf Course is incredibly scenic and challenging for players of any skill level.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take a break from the ordinary—and from the ordinary resort—at Purana Residence. This four-bedroom, fully staffed luxury Koh Samui vacation rental gives you the personal service and amenities of a resort in a beautifully appointed private villa. Though it’s in a spectacular setting overlooking rolling hills of tropical rainforest and the Gulf of Samui, it’s also close to some of Thailand’s best beaches and intriguing local sights, making it ideal for celebrating a special family occasion or taking a memorable getaway with friends.

During your stay, a dedicated housekeeper, butler and villa manager are on hand, and a chef can prepare both Thai specialties and Western favorites. Don’t forget to take advantage of the Thai cooking lesson and massage or yoga session. When you’re not partaking of the daily fresh-baked cookies and fresh-blended smoothies, grab a spot in the sun on a lounger or daybed on the terrace next to the infinity pool and let yourself relax. Flip on the outdoor sound system to set the mood as you serve drinks at the swim-up bar or heat up the barbecue in the outdoor kitchen. End the day with a delicious meal at the al-fresco dining area.

From the beautiful landscaping by renowned designer Bill Bensley outside to the specially commissioned pieces inside, every detail at Purana Residence has been considered. Not only does the spacious great room feature an airy shell of glass walls and a high peaked ceiling, it’s filled with hand-woven fabrics and traditional carved furniture for an atmosphere that’s bright and sunny yet refined. A sitting area at one end has plenty of sofas, chairs and benches to seat everyone, the formal dining area can comfortably accommodate up to eight guests, and the fully equipped kitchen at the other end of the great room has a breakfast bar.

The villa’s four bedrooms show the same thought and care; a king bed, en-suite bathroom with rain shower and a door to the balcony or terrace makes each one feel like a lavish honeymoon suite. Linger in the lounge chairs in the bedrooms or in the glassed-in, spa-worthy showers in the bathrooms—you’re on holiday after all.

If you can tear yourself away from the pool terrace at Purana Residence, there’s plenty to see and do in the area, from Fisherman’s Village, Big Buddha Temple and the piers at Nathon and Koh Samui to the Koh Samui Rainforest, the Nathon Night Food Market and Namuang Safari Park. Don’t miss the nearby beaches, from Bophut, 3 km away, and Chaweng and Maenam, about 8 km away, to Lamai, 17 km away, and Nathon, 20 km away. When it’s time to return home, plan on a 9 km drive from the villa to Samui Airport to make your connection.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

 

Fill your camera roll with stunning sea and sunset views at Villa Amanzi Kamala. This thoughtfully designed, carefully built vacation rental spills over the hillside toward the emerald waters of the Andaman Sea in a show of architectural mastery. Though it’s tucked away on the exclusive Cape Amarin estate on Phuket’s west coast, it’s close to Kamala Beach, golf courses, restaurants, entertainment and more.

A nearly 50-foot infinity pool sets a tone of resort-worthy luxury for the villa’s living spaces. Entertain friends and family or simply relax on the loungers alongside the pool or in the outdoor sitting area. Sit down to a meal fresh from the barbecue as you watch the sunset from the al-fresco dining area. After sunset, gather in the media room or share photos of your holiday via Wi-Fi.

Inspired by traditional Thai stilt houses, the villa’s award-winning architecture follows the slope of the hillside, with the bedrooms forming a bridge and the main living areas below. The breathtaking great room can be opened on two sides via slide-away glass walls; the other two walls are formed from the landscape’s rock face. Open-concept living and dining areas are minimalist yet inviting, and the fully equipped kitchen will have you eager to try out local ingredients.

Each of the six bedrooms at Villa Amanzi Kamala is a private haven with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and ocean view or terrace access. Floor-to-ceiling glass perfectly frames the sea and sky, while wood floors lend traditional warmth to the bedroom suites.

The villa’s Cape Amarin location puts guests close to the resort-lined stretch of Kamala Beach and the lively nightlife of Patong Beach. Book a tee time at one of two nearby golf courses, bring the family to a unique dinner show at FantaSea or find a tucked-away spot for a honeymoon-worthy dinner amid the heritage buildings in Phuket Old Town.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
An oasis of tranquility, Roxo treats you to incredible views over the tropical Andaman Sea. Spend lazy days on the graceful poolside terrace, and blissful evenings in the upper lounge, admiring colorful sunsets and starry nights. Enjoy the warm, golden sands of the villa’s neighboring beach. A little further afield, explore the natural beauty of Phang Nga Bay.

A wall of palms rises from the mirror-like infinity pool. From the wooden decking, peer at rippling reflections as you recline on a sumptuous lounger, cocktail in hand, basking in the tropical sun. Saunter over to the shaded outdoor table for a light lunch. Look forward to evening meals, enjoying smoky aromas from the barbeque by the pool as you gather in the open plan dining area. If you need to steal a couple of hours to keep on top of your home affairs, retire to the private office space on the ground floor – there’s Wi-Fi throughout the villa.

The open-plan tiled and teak wood interiors at Villa Roxo combine with heavenly surroundings to create a serene, carefree ambiance. A glass walled central staircase connects the peaceful ground floor living room with the upper lounge, where sliding doors open to welcome in a therapeutic sea breeze. Contrasting with the predominantly open-plan design, a comfortable recessed television den is a cozy retreat. Stretch out on the giant couch and wind-down after dinner.

Roxo’s master suites both offer un-rivalled views from their king size beds, over emerald palms out to tropical waters and a brilliant blue sky. From one, step onto your private terrace to salute the day. Or conclude your evening with a romantic nightcap looking out to sea. From the other, light a candle at the side of your ocean view bathtub, for a wonderful, heavenly soak. The two stylish twin bedrooms provide ultra-comfort – melt into crisp, white sheets and lovely plump pillows after a day of discovery. The twin rooms share a bathroom with impressive glass walled rain-shower and each have a television.

Take a leisurely boat trip from Phuket to witness the famous ‘James Bond Island’. Towering twenty metres above sea level, this striking islet was featured in seventies Bond movie ‘The Man with the Golden Gun’. Undulating Blue Canyon golf course is a short drive away. Visited by golfing great Tiger Woods, and featuring an array of intriguing natural hazards, you are sure to play a memorable game on the Canyon Course. Phuket airport is a 27 km drive from the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
From its awe-inspiring location on a forested headland, Hale Malia watches imperiously over the Indian Ocean. This magnificent villa blends nature and luxury seamlessly to bring you perfection in paradise. Laze on a lounger by its iridescent infinity pool and you’ll be caressed by the sun and the soft breeze from the Andaman Sea. Gather for sundowners at sunset against a backdrop of fragrant plants and lush vegetation. Here, on the exclusive Samsara estate, you will be enveloped in peace and relaxation.

Perched majestically above the dazzling sea and rocky coastline, Hale Malia truly is the height of luxury. It has been skilfully designed to blur the distinction between indoor and outdoor living with acres of glass and open space. From your wrap-around terrace you can slip into the sensual embrace of a turquoise pool which appears to stretch to the horizon. Under the shelter of your columned gazebo you can enjoy a relaxed barbecue accompanied by the stars. In this villa at one with its surroundings you can be at one with yourself.

Clad in local stone and enhanced with attractive Asian woodwork, Hale Malia blends into its environment beautifully. Descend the wooden steps from the entrance to its spacious living room and you’ll be greeted by a vast glass-fronted atrium. Under this impressive awning sit comfortable sofas and chairs arranged to give you spectacular views. Within these walls you’ll also find an elegant dining area and relaxed home theater. A sensuous sauna and steam room add to the allure alongside a peaceful Yoga pavilion. During your stay you’ll be cared for by your attentive chef and butler.

Each of this villa’s four spacious and inviting bedrooms looks out over the radiant sea. Designed to give you total flexibility in your sleeping arrangements they feature everything from king-sized beds to comfy twins. Gleaming bathrooms boast elegant china fittings and soothing showers. From the master suite you can recline in your own jetted tub overlooking the ocean.

Ensconced in this rural retreat surrounded by nature you can escape from your day-to-day cares. But this property also gives you access to an array of Phuket attractions. A short five minute drive takes you to the quiet beach and sleepy resort of Kamala where you can play tennis and pick up essentials. Further along the coast you’ll find the bright lights of Patong. This thriving, bustling town offers a complete alternative from the secluded relaxation of Hale Malia.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: Hale Malia is one of a select handful of private residences located within the Samsara Estate. Few, if any, private enclaves in the world match the unsurpassed luxury and privacy of Samsara. Straddling a secluded peninsula, it is a stunning juxtaposition of rocky shoreline, tropical gardens, and calming blue waters. Perched dramatically between 40 to 60 meters above sea level, these oceanfront villas offer spectacular panoramic views to the west and north over the Andaman Sea and Nakalay beach and to the south across Patong Bay.

ul.li: The Samara Estate is patrolled 24 hours per day by a 3 man security team

listing.listing_description:
From views over the perfectly palm-fringed Nai Thon Beach to spectacular sunsets over the Andaman Sea, Malaiwana Penthouse will leave you breathless. Perched on a hillside on the northwest coast of Phuket, this serene four-bedroom vacation rental makes an ideal escape for up to eight friends and family members. And though the surroundings make it feel like your own private tropical idyll, this luxury property is close to golf, spas, beach clubs and even the airport.

The penthouse’s glass doors slide open to an incredible terrace with loungers, a barbecue, a pergola-covered sitting area, an al-fresco dining area and a heated infinity pool that seems to spill into the sea. After a day on the terrace or the beach, treat yourself to a glass from the wine fridge and a favorite show or movie in the villa’s media room, or post photos from your holiday via Wi-Fi.

Thanks to the wall of sliding glass doors, it’s easy to open the penthouse’s open-concept living areas to the terrace, creating one seamless indoor-outdoor space. The sleek great room is stylish yet understated, with mod pieces that make a chic statement without trying to outdo the views. Catch up on reading on the tuxedo-style sofas, relive the day’s adventures around the pedestal dining table or sip an espresso from the machine at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the four bedrooms at Malaiwana Penthouse has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and direct terrace access; two of the four have their own lounge areas as well. Spectacular views, crisp white bedding and spa-worthy bathrooms splashed in marble make the bedrooms into luxe retreats to rival any honeymoon suite.

While it’s tempting to simply spend a stay relaxing by the pool, it’s well worth the short walk or buggy ride down the hill from the villa to Nai Thon Beach, where you can sunbathe on the soft sand, swim or snorkel in the clear, warm water, or sample fresh seafood from local vendors. Book a tee time at the nearby golf course or a treatment at one of several spas close by, or set off on a fishing or sailing excursion from the Royal Phuket Marina.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Acacia offers an inspiring beachfront location on Koh Samui at Miskawaan Estate, an exclusive hamlet bordering Maenam and Bangrak beaches along the island's north shore. Designed in a vintage Thai style and endowed with high-end amenities for dining and entertainment, the four-bedroom home offers an exquisite setting for experiencing the unique beauty of this Southeast Asian gem. Special features include a poolside bar, alfresco dining sala, outdoor projector screen, sumptuous massage bed, and expansive views of the Gulf of Thailand. Your vacation rental includes an outstanding Villa Manager among other talented staff.

Nestled amid vibrant gardens, the gem-toned swimming pool extends across the property, steps from the soft white sands and luminous waves. Lounge chairs are perched on the lush grass beneath swaying palms, perfect for gazing upon the sweeping ocean views and Koh Pha Ngan island in the distance. The superb sala shelters a massage bed and rustic table for meals in the sea-fresh breeze.

The main living pavilion features high, vaulted ceilings over a spacious salon and lovely dining table. Amber-toned natural wood and a spectacular painting with luxuriant colors harmonize with the gardens and sea. Sliding doors allow the home to breathe the ocean air, while air conditioning keeps the ambiance cool when needed. The full bar on the veranda (complete with extensive wine fridge) forms the fulcrum of this seamless indoor/outdoor space.

The elegant minimalism of the bedroom furnishings accentuates the fine artistry of the wooden walls, infusing your downtime hours with a timeless serenity. Each room features an ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet, ceiling fan, and air conditioning, and all open to the pool terrace or inner courtyard garden. The master bedroom opens directly to the pool and its own furnished veranda facing the sea.

Miskawaan (meaning "Buddha's gardens") offers an excellent alternative to Koh Samui's popular resorts, well-suited to weddings, special occasions, or intimate getaways. Its prime location places you within easy reach of iconic destinations like Big Buddha and Fisherman's Village, the famed golf courses at Royal Samui and Santiburi, and several ancient temples. Myriad activities can be arranged nearby, from watersports to Muay Thai lessons, yoga to cooking classes, yachting to zip-lining over tropical waterfalls.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched on a seaside hill overlooking the beach, lush tropical greenery, and an endless ocean view, Villa Rodnaya is the perfect home base for your next Luxury Retreat. Just steps from home, you’ll love strolling along the sandy shores of Nai Thon Beach. Located within a protected National Park area, this beach is virtually untouched by modern development, making it one of Phuket’s most beautiful and secluded beach areas. On the edges of Nai Thon Beach, there are intricate coral reef systems that make perfect homes for colorful fish, and a great environment to try snorkeling.

Rodnaya’s pool deck/top floor is an open-air oasis. With sliding glass doors stretching the entire length of the villa, fresh sea breeze, natural sunlight, and incomparable ocean views are ever-present. With a nod to traditional Thai architecture, Rodnaya’s open concept living/dining/kitchen area is covered by a beautiful gabled roof. Underneath this iconic piece of Thai construction, designers shift the decor in a modern-luxurious direction. High-end designer furniture, state of the art electronics, and contemporary works of art add a sophisticated elegance to the beach villa atmosphere.

With a helpful staff that includes a villa manager, private chef, security guard, and housekeeper, you’ll have nothing to focus on except rest and relaxation. Each bedroom offers an incredible ocean view, king size bed, and access to an ocean-facing balcony or terrace. And, the Master, situated in its own poolside pavilion, enjoys a little extra privacy.

If there’s a golfer in your group, Laguna Phuket Golf Course is just a few minutes away. With its undulating fairways, dynamic scenery changes, and challenging layout, Laguna is a course you’ll want to play over and over. And, Laguna has been rated “Asia’s Best Golf Course” by the World Golf Awards. If you’re in the mood for some shopping, visit Boat Avenue, an outdoor mall with shops, bars, restaurants, and a grocery store. Boat Avenue is located just outside the Laguna Phuket Resort Complex and features stores that have been sustainably designed and constructed using shipping containers.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Situated along the sandy shores of balmy Natai Beach, this peaceful villa is surrounded by lush jungles, waterfalls, and endless beachfront. Walk for hours along the 10-kilometer stretch of coastline, dipping your toes into the crystal clear water as the waves roll in. Snorkelling, diving, golf, yachting, and sightseeing in Phang Nga Bay, Baba Beach Club, and Sarasin Bridge are all within reach.

Soaring ceilings create an open space while full-length windows drench the interior with natural sunlight. Dramatic views are exposed the second you step foot in Villa Yaringa and can be found in every room. Watch the cinematic sunsets from the sunken lounge, or the seafront sala. An in-house chef will prepare a true taste of local cuisine in the fitted kitchen, designed with granite countertops, or perhaps on the open air barbecue. 

Cool down in the sapphire blue infinity pool, complete with its own tree-shaded island. Double sunbeds on the terrace offer a relaxing spot to enjoy happy hour or an addictive novel. (Or both.) On days ventured outside of the villa, markets, shopping, and buzzworthy nightclubs in Phuket are just an hour’s drive away. The palm-lined property inspires complete relaxation. Recharge in mountain pose with a private yoga instructor or indulge in a traditional Thai massage. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
